Package ohos.agp.components

Class PageSliderProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.PageSliderProvider

  • public abstract class PageSliderProvider
extends Object
    Provides the page adapter to manage page views.

    This class provides the page item management functions, such as calculating the number of available views and creating a component at a specified position. You need to inherit and implement PageSliderProvider to display multiple views on different pages.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int POSITION_INVALID
      Indicates that a page is invalid from a container.
      static int POSITION_REMAIN
      Indicates that the position of a page remains unchanged in a container.

    • Method Detail

      • getCount

        public abstract int getCount​()
        Obtains the number of available views in the current adapter.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of available views.

      • createPageInContainer

        public abstract Object createPageInContainer​(ComponentContainer container,
                                             int position)
        Creates a page at a specified position.

        The page is added to the specified position in a container.

        Parameters:
        container - Indicates the container to display PageSliderProvider.
        position - Indicates the specified position in the container.
        Returns:
        Returns the displayed page.

      • destroyPageFromContainer

        public abstract void destroyPageFromContainer​(ComponentContainer container,
                                              int position,
                                              Object object)
        Destroys a specified page in a container.
        Parameters:
        container - Indicates the container to which the page adapter belongs.
        position - Indicates the specified position in the container.
        object - Indicates the page to be destroyed.

      • isPageMatchToObject

        public abstract boolean isPageMatchToObject​(Component page,
                                            Object object)
        Checks whether a component is associated with a specific object returned from createPageInContainer(ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer,int).
        Parameters:
        page - Indicates Component to be checked.
        object - Indicates the object associated with component to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether the component is associated with the object.

      • startUpdate

        public void startUpdate​(ComponentContainer container)
        Receives a notification indicating that an update on the displayed page is about to occur.
        Parameters:
        container - Indicates ComponentContainer to which the page adapter belongs.

      • onUpdateFinished

        public void onUpdateFinished​(ComponentContainer componentContainer)
        Notifies a container that a page update is finished.

        When calling this method, you must ensure that all pages have been added to or removed from the container as required.

        Parameters:
        componentContainer - Indicates the container to which the page adapter belongs.
        Since:
        4

      • getPageIndex

        public int getPageIndex​(Object object)
        Obtains the index of an object in a container.
        Parameters:
        object - Indicates the object used to generate a component.
        Returns:
        Returns the index of the object in the container; returns POSITION_REMAIN if the object index has not changed; returns POSITION_INVALID if the object is absent from the container.
        Since:
        4

      • notifyDataChanged

        public void notifyDataChanged​()
        Notifies the page slider provider of a data set change.

        This method is called when the data to be displayed has changed.

        Since:
        4

      • addDataSubscriber

        public final void addDataSubscriber​(DataSetSubscriber subscriber)
        Adds an subscriber for the current PageSliderProvider.

        The subscriber receives callbacks related to data changes.

        Parameters:
        subscriber - Indicates the subscriber.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the parameter value is null.
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if the object is already added
        Since:
        4

      • removeDataSubscriber

        public final void removeDataSubscriber​(DataSetSubscriber subscriber)
        Unregisters an subscriber from the current PageSliderProvider.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - Indicates the subscriber to be removed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the parameter value is null.
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if the object is already removed
        Since:
        4

      • getPageTitle

        public String getPageTitle​(int position)
        Obtains the title of a page at a specified position.

        This method can be used for a PageSliderProvider object to obtain the title of a specified page.

        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the page in PageSliderProvider.
        Returns:
        Returns the page title.
